POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyUserProfile
<公共请求参数>

{
    "UserId": "2kJJBH6G1dfBFUJqXLh0Mg3ELLk",
    "Nickname": "zhangsan"
}
ModifyUserProfile.title: 修改用户配置

RegisterUser.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RegisterUser
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1234657
}
RegisterUser.title: 注册用户

SendRoomNormalMessage.title: 指定用户给房间中发送消息

SendRoomNotificationMessage.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SendRoomNotificationMessage
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 3520371,
    "RoomId": 352320437,
    "MsgContent": "你好"
}
SendRoomNotificationMessage.title: 房间中发送群公告

SetAppCustomContent.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SetAppCustomContent
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 123,
    "CustomContent": [
        {
            "Scene": "default",
            "LogoUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/logo.png",
            "HomeUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/login",
            "JsUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/default.js",
            "CssUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/default.css"
        }
    ]
}
SetAppCustomContent.title: 设置应用自定义内容

SetMarquee.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SetMarquee
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 34442819,
    "RoomId": 353861,
    "MarqueeType": 1,
    "DisplayMode": 1,
    "Content": "#FFFF00",
    "FontSize": 11,
    "FontWeight": 1,
    "FontOpacity": 0.3,
    "BackgroundColor": "#FFFF00",
    "BackgroundOpacity": 0.3,
    "Duration": 3,
    "MarqueeCount": 1
}
SetMarquee.title: 设置跑马灯参数设置

SetWatermark.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SetWatermark
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 123333,
    "TeacherUrl": "https://tcic-backend-record-22112222.cos.ap-beujing.myqcloud.com/teacher-02_219090_210001.png",
    "BoardUrl": "https://tcic-backend-record-22112222.cos.ap-beujing.myqcloud.com/board-02_219090_210001.png",
    "VideoUrl": "https://tcic-backend-record-22112222.cos.ap-beujing.myqcloud.com/video-02_219090_210001.png",
    "BoardW": 0,
    "BoardH": 0,
    "BoardX": 50,
    "BoardY": 50,
    "TeacherW": 0,
    "TeacherH": 0,
    "TeacherX": 50,
    "TeacherY": 50,
    "Text": "文本内容",
    "TextColor": "黑"
}
SetWatermark.title: 示例
